Package org.exist.collections

Collection management

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Collection This class represents a collection in the database.
CollectionCache Global cache for Collection objects.
CollectionConfiguration  
CollectionConfiguration.TriggerConfig  
CollectionConfigurationManager Manages index configurations.
CollectionURI URI to represent a Collection path internally in eXist
IndexInfo Internal class used to track required fields between calls to Collection.validateXMLResource(Txn, DBBroker, XmldbURI, InputSource) and Collection.store(Txn, DBBroker, IndexInfo, InputSource, boolean).
 

Exception Summary
CollectionConfigurationException
